mapper.select: /* 사진 댓글 리스트 */ SELECT COMT_SEQ as "seq", PHOTO_SEQ as "photoSeq", COMT_USERNAME as "username", COMT_PWD as "password", COMT_CONTENTS as "contents", COMT_DATE as "date", PARENT_COMT as "parentSeq" FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PHOTO_COMT WHERE PHOTO_SEQ = #{photoSeq} ORDER BY CONCAT(IF(PARENT_COMT is null, COALESCE(PARENT_COMT, ''), CONCAT('_', LPAD(PARENT_COMT,6,'0')) ), '_',LPAD(COMT_SEQ,6,'0'))

/* 사진 댓글 가져오기 */ SELECT COMT_SEQ as "seq", PHOTO_SEQ as "photoSeq", COMT_USERNAME as "username", COMT_PWD as "password", COMT_CONTENTS as "contents", COMT_DATE as "DATE", PARENT_COMT as "parentSeq" FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PHOTO_COMT WHERE COMT_SEQ = #{seq}
